x_buno_doc_paragraph.html_body: You are under the obligation of complete confidentiality during the employment, as well as after termination, with regards to all matters concerning the business of the Company and/or other entities within the Maersk Drilling Group, and other information that may have become known to you as a result of your position. However, this does not apply if it relates to matters which have been made publicly available by the Company and/or other entities within the Maersk Drilling Group or which for other reasons naturally may be communicated to third parties. For the sake of good order we draw your attention to the Danish Act on Trade Secrets (“Lov om forretningshemmeligheder”), according to which certain restrictions are imposed on the use of confidential information after the termination of your employment.

section.display_value: Obligation of Confidentiality and Return of Property
